text: Harness the crimson might of Khorne
As you delve deeper into the dark heart of Khorne's power, the relentless rage of the Blood God's chosen becomes an unstoppable force, leaving nothing but devastation in its wake
Cleave through the ranks of the enemy in an unrelenting storm of destruction.
Unlock the secrets of the Dark Gods and broaden the wellspring
The convergence of the Chaos Gods knows no limits, and through this dark communion, the undivided faithful gain access to an ever-expanding array of boundless gifts from the realms of Chaos.
Embrace the relentless fury of Khorne to stoke the fires of war and witness your horde grow in unending bloodlust, swelling the ranks of the Blood God's faithful warriors
Unlock the mysteries of Tzeentch's ever-shifting magic, and harness the power
Dive deeper into the labyrinthine secrets of Tzeentch's sorcery, and bring uncertainty and chaos to all who stand in its path.
Engulf your foes in a chaotic inferno of change and destruction.
Channel the boundless energies of change and transformation on the battlefield.
Weave seduction into every strike and parry
Every sorrowful note carries an intoxicating undertone of ecstasy.
